      MtG Battlefield

      Keyboard controls:

      • ? : Focus search box.
      • G : Toggle grid size.
      • I : Toggle information panel.
      • ESC : Close search results pane / information panel.
      • 1-9 : Select a card in the visible grid; double tap to launch.
      • Arrows : Step through search results and card grid.
      • Enter  : Add a search result, or launch selected grid card.
      • Delete : Remove selected grid card.

      All content from magiccards.info. This application is open source on GitHub.
